Chocolate Peanut Butter Protein Cookies

The ultimate combo of chocolate and peanut butter with 22g protein. Fudgy chocolate base with a peanut butter swirl.

24
minutes
12
cookies
Easy
difficulty

Nutrition per cookies

185
cal
22g
protein
14g
carbs
9g
fat

Ingredients

  • oat flour 90g
  • chocolate whey protein powder 60g
  • unsweetened cocoa powder 25g
  • baking soda 3g
  • salt 2g
  • almond butter 85g
  • maple syrup 80g
  • large egg 1g
  • vanilla extract 5g
  • natural peanut butter (for swirl) 64g

Instructions

1

Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.

2

Whisk together oat flour, protein powder, cocoa powder, baking soda, and salt.

3

Combine almond butter, maple syrup, egg, and vanilla until smooth.

4

Add wet to dry and mix until a dough forms.

5

Scoop 12 portions onto baking sheet. Make a small indent in each.

6

Add 1/2 teaspoon peanut butter to each indent. Use a toothpick to swirl.

7

Bake for 10-12 minutes until edges are set.

8

Cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring.
